name: Serta_RTA_Martinique_Collection_78-inch_Navarre_Beige_Fabric_Sofa
reviews: I purchased this sofa for a den. I needed something smaller than the full sized sofas and this was the perfect size. There is some assembly but it is very easy to do. The seat cushions are vacuum packed and fluffed up as soon as we took them out of the packaging. The color is a light beige and the fabric is soft but feels to be good quality. I am very pleased with this sofa.
description: Enjoy the Serta tradition of quality, comfort and style with the Serta at Home Sofa2Go Navarre Collection Sofa. A great choice for dorms, vacation homes and apartments, this compact sofa has a fashion-forward look that helps create a welcoming atmosphere even when you're working with limited space. Sturdy and dependable, this sofa is made with stable and durable hardwood materials that are built to last. Whether you're relaxing in front of the TV or entertaining guests, the high-density foam and poly-fiber cushioned coils of this modern-style sofa provide plush comfort that won't disappoint. Pillowed back cushions deliver long-lasting support and retain their shape to keep your sofa looking at its best for years to come. Part of the Navarre Collection, this sofa features straight arms and a loose cushion back.Set includes: One (1) sofa, Two (2) pillowsIt comes upholstered in a luxurious beige fabric with matching pillows and has square footers in a contrasting espresso finish for a subtly modern style.Pair this sofa with the matching Navarre collection loveseat to create a completely coordinated look.Premium S-coil for extra support, individually wrapped coils surrounded by high-density foam and quality poly-fibers for supportive seatingComes in one easily transportable compact box that is easy to maneuver up stairs and around cornersTool-free set up makes it simple to assemble and disassemble for easy movingPillowed back cushions feature a poly-fiber core and non-woven cover that retains shape and density for lasting comfortLoose cushions (non-reversible)Finish: EspressoUpholstery color: BeigeMaterials: Polyester fabric, metal, wood, foam, plasticWeight: 99 lbsSeat dimensions: 20 inches high x 64 inches wide x 20.5 inches deepDimensions (overall): 35 inches high x 78 inches wide x 32.5 inches deepStyleContemporaryMaterialFoam, Metal, Plastic, Polyester, WoodTypeSofaAssemblyAssembly RequiredColorBeigeFurniture PatternSolid
